message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can negotiate further if you'd like.
I'll take a bit more, but I'm willing to compromise. Your turn to negotiate!
I'm willing to compromise and offer you 40% this round. If you accept, we can both end this game and move on with our lives. If you want to continue, I'm prepared to stand my ground.
I'm not willing to give up too much, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Your turn to think about it!
This is my final offer. I'm willing to split the money equally. If you reject this, I'm prepared to let the inflation continue to erode our gains. It's your call.
